page.title: 09A Junior Sports Meeting
page.content: Once every summer ten schools take part in a local sports meeting.There are eleven different events.These include:various length running races,relays and other events like skipping,wheelbarrow and sack races. The schools meet on a large field with a running track on which the events take place.If you come first you receive a red rosette,for second a blue and for third a yellow one.To choose our team we had heats first.The fastest people raced on the day.Those in the 400m race were sent round the field twice for training.The other people practised their special events on the school field.On the day we did half of the events, had a break for refreshments and then did the others.Some people were in more than one event.
